name: declarative-js-symbols
description: Symbols to extend  JavaScript Array and Object prototypes with declarative-js functionality.

scripts.build: npm run delete:target && npm run compile && npm test && npm run lint
scripts.copy: cp package.json target/out/package.json && cp readme.md target/out/readme.md && cp LICENCE target/out/LICENCE && cp .npmignore target/out/.npmignore
scripts.commit:test: git add . && git commit -m "test commit" && git push
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm run copy && npm publish target/out
scripts.docs:commit: npm run docsify && git add . && git commit -m "Updated generated documentation" && git push

author: Pavel Surinin <pavel.surinin@gmail.com>
